title: Harley Davidson to have a key role in Hero MotoCorp's premium play: Pawan Munjal
description: Hero MotoCorp's chairman, Pawan Munjal, believes that Harley Davidson will be instrumental in expanding the company's presence in the premium motorcycle segment. Munjal expressed the possibility of further partnership expansion on a global scale once the initial product successfully satisfies customers in India. Hero MotoCorp is launching the Harley Davidson X440, with a Hero-branded product on the same platform coming later in the year.
